text:
Notices inviting Offers under the provisions of Sections 
21.3 and 
21.4 of this Chapter must be published in accordance with the Charter and Municipal Code of San Francisco. At least five calendar days must intervene between the date of last publication and the time for filing such sealed Offers. The published notice must contain a general description of the Commodity or Service, the due date for Offers, and a City contact phone number. 
(Added by Ord. 156-99, File No. 990743, App. 6/2/99)
